newsitem.title: USA: Falcon Drilling stock priced at $35.50/shr.
newsitem.headline: Falcon Drilling stock priced at $35.50/shr.

text.p: Falcon Drilling Co Inc said Tuesday its offering of 7.0 million common shares was priced at $35.50 per share in simultaneous U.S. and international offerings.
The company said it is selling 3.0 million shares, and shareholders are selling the rest.

Falcon said it will use its proceeds to expand deepwater operations through the acquisition of additional rigs and the refurbishment and upgrade of existing rigs, and to repay amounts outstanding under its working capital facility.

It said CS First Boston, Donaldson Lufkin & Jenrette Securities Corp, Salomon Brothers Inc, Schroder Wertheim & Co, and Simmons and Co International are the managers of the U.S. syndicate offering 5,950,000 shares. CS First Boston, Donaldson Lufkin, Salomon Brothers International Ltd and Schroders are lead managers of the international offering of 1,050,000 shares.
The company said an over-allotment option was granted on up to an additional 250,000 shares by Falcon and 800,000 shares by certain shareholders.
